title: Queen’s Gate - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Sci-fi   Yuri
author: Eiichi Shitara   Okita Eiji   沖田 栄次   設楽英一
description: The adventures of the Treasure Hunter Alice, specialized in OOPArts, who in the middle of her usual competition with her rival Dorothy, discovers there's a mysterious organization also interested in collecting the artifacts. And they seem to think those are the key to opening the 'Queen's Gate', the last device Alice's mother was investigating before she suddenly vanished...>
